channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8298514] vmTestbase/nsk/jdi/EventRequestManager/threadDeathRequests/thrdeathreq002/TestDescription.java fails with usage tracker
item.description:

# ERROR: ##> debugger: ERROR: Exception : nsk.share.jdi.JDITestRuntimeException: JDITestRuntimeException : ** event 'ThreadDeathEvent in thread UsageTracker' IS NOT a breakpoint **
The following stacktrace is for failure analysis.
nsk.share.TestFailure: ##> debugger: ERROR: Exception : nsk.share.jdi.JDITestRuntimeException: JDITestRuntimeException : ** event 'ThreadDeathEvent in thread UsageTracker' IS NOT a breakpoint **

com.sun.jdi.VMDisconnectedException: connection is closed
Killing debugee VM process


#>
#> SUMMARY: Following errors occured
#> during test execution:
#>
# ERROR: ##> debugger: ERROR: Exception : nsk.share.jdi.JDITestRuntimeException: JDITestRuntimeException : ** event 'ThreadDeathEvent in thread UsageTracker' IS NOT a breakpoint **

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk17u-dev/pull/3643
Date: 2025-06-16 15:13:38 +0000

Fix request [17u]

I backport this to fix this issue and to make later backorts clean.
No risk, only a test change.
Clean backport.
Test passes. SAP nightly testing passed.

Changeset: a120764c
Author: Alex Menkov <amenkov@openjdk.org>
Date: 2022-12-13 19:49:16 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/a120764cc4636b3b0cd128d43de148bdc3f4513b
The set of "noreg-" suffixes is defined here: https://openjdk.org/guide/#noreg , Based on the PR, I'm guessing that "noreg-self" was the intent. Please modify as necessary.

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/11621
Date: 2022-12-09 23:21:04 +0000
